itunes:author: iBooks
title: Justin Halpern: Meet the Author
itunes:subtitle: Join New York Times best-selling author Justin Halpern (Sh*t My Dad Says) for a discussion about his new book, I Suck at Girls, a laugh-out-loud collection of funny and touching stories of his romantic coming-of-age misadventures. Justin will give a reading, share some stories that inspired him, and take questions from the audience.
itunes:summary: Join New York Times best-selling author Justin Halpern (Sh*t My Dad Says) for a discussion about his new book, I Suck at Girls, a laugh-out-loud collection of funny and touching stories of his romantic coming-of-age misadventures. Justin will give a reading, share some stories that inspired him, and take questions from the audience.
itunes:keywords: Shit my Dad Says, Bleep My Dad Says, $#*! My Dad Says, William Shatner, Don't Tell My Mother, Justin Halpern, I Suck at Girls
